agenda.description: SENATE NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: Water & Rural Affairs TIME & DATE: 1:30 PM, Monday, February 4, 2019 PLACE: E1.012 (Hearing Room) CHAIR: Senator Charles Perry The Senate Committee on Water and Rural Affairs will meet to consider and adopt the Committee rules, and will receive an overview and update from the following State Agencies: · Texas Water Development Board · Texas Commission on Environmental Quality · Texas State Soil and Water Conservation Board Invited Testimony Only.
